entities.name: angelina
entities.description: Angelina is mentioned as the one who told Harry to go straight to her and ask for a favor. She stormed away after giving this advice.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who received advice from Angelina and is planning to ask Umbridge for a favor.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being present with Harry and Hermione in the Great Hall.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being present with Ron and Harry in the Great Hall.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned as the one who Harry plans to ask for a favor.

entities.name: puddlemere united
entities.description: Puddlemere United is mentioned as a team that Harry and his friends are checking on.

entities.name: oliver wood
entities.description: Oliver Wood is mentioned as the person who might have been killed during a training session.

relationships.description: Harry plans to ask Umbridge for a favor.
Harry and his friends are checking on the status of Oliver Wood with Puddlemere United.
